snippet.title: Indie Game Combines Shoot Em' Up and Pinball!! Retro Space Ball beta footage!
snippet.description:
Retro Space Ball is a unique pixel art shmup pinball variant! 
Play the beta for free! 
Head to https://RikOclon.com for more info!

Join the Retro Space Ball Newsletter! 
https://mailchi.mp/a9a298f52196/rsb-newsletter-signup

Join the community on our discord server! 
https://discord.gg/JkWaqND
